acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: These records were transferred from the Virginia State Library and Archives and comprise both paper and microfilm materials.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Paper records concern the University of Virginia School of Medicine Committee for Child Protection, chaired chiefly by Gerald W. DeWitt, M.D. Microfilm records (reels 2-5) [originals at the Virginia State Library and Archives], which complement these committee records, pertain to the Governor's Advisory Committee on Child Abuse and Neglect, chaired by Anthony Shaw, M.D., Professor of Pedriatics and Surgery at the University of Virginia. Reel 1, microfilm copy of the contents of Box 1, is available only through the Virginia State Library and Archives.
